query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS riderLocations (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  riderId INT NOT NULL,
  orderId INT,
  latitude VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  longitude VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('idle', 'en_route_pickup', 'en_route_delivery', 'offline') DEFAULT 'idle' NOT NULL,
  speed INT DEFAULT 0,
  heading INT DEFAULT 0,
  accuracy INT DEFAULT 0,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS inventoryAlerts (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  productId INT NOT NULL,
  alertType ENUM('low_stock', 'out_of_stock', 'overstocked') NOT NULL,
  threshold INT NOT NULL,
  currentStock INT NOT NULL,
  severity ENUM('critical', 'warning', 'info') NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('active', 'resolved', 'dismissed') DEFAULT 'active' NOT NULL,
  resolvedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  resolvedBy INT,
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS inventoryThresholds (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  productId INT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  lowStockThreshold INT NOT NULL,
  criticalStockThreshold INT NOT NULL,
  overstockThreshold INT,
  autoReorder INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  reorderQuantity INT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
